cards.english: to one's heart's content, with all one's might
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's omoikiri

sentence.kanji: カラオケで思い切り歌ったの。
sentence.romaji: karaoke de omoikiri utata no
sentence.english: I sang karaoke to my heart's content.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's omoigakenai

sentence.kanji: 彼から思いがけないことを聞いた。
sentence.romaji: kare kara omoigakenai koto wo kiita
sentence.english: I heard something unexpected from him.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hongoku

sentence.kanji: 彼女は本国に帰りました。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha hongoku ni kaerimashita
sentence.english: She returned to her native land.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's hitsuzen

sentence.kanji: 私と彼が出会ったのは必然だったの。
sentence.romaji: watashi to kare ga deata no ha hitsuzen data no
sentence.english: It was inevitable that he and I should meet.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's magokoro

sentence.kanji: 彼女は真心をこめて彼にケーキを作ったよ。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha magokoro wo komete kare ni ke-ki wo tsukuta yo
sentence.english: She put her heart into baking him a cake.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jikoku

sentence.kanji: 自国の文化を大切にしましょう。
sentence.romaji: jikoku no bunka wo taisetsu ni shimashou
sentence.english: Let's take good care of our own country's culture.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's jikai

sentence.kanji: 次回の会議は2週間後に行います。
sentence.romaji: jikai no kaigi ha ni shuukan go ni okonaimasu
sentence.english: The next meeting will be held in two weeks.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ichiou

sentence.kanji: 彼にも一応知らせておいたほうがいいだろう。
sentence.romaji: kare ni mo ichiou shirasete oita hou ga iidarou
sentence.english: It'd be better to just let him know.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's omoi

sentence.kanji: 必死の思いで彼に頼んだよ。
sentence.romaji: hishi no omoi de kare ni tanonda yo
sentence.english: I asked him out of desperation.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tengoku

sentence.kanji: 死んだら天国に行きたいです。
sentence.romaji: shindara tengoku ni ikitai desu
sentence.english: I want to go to heaven when I die.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tabou

sentence.kanji: 彼女は多忙な人です。
sentence.romaji: kanojo ha tabou na hito desu
sentence.english: She's a busy person.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ikou

sentence.kanji: 彼の意向を聞いてみましょう。
sentence.romaji: kare no ikou wo kiite mimashou
sentence.english: Let's ask what he intends to do.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koui

sentence.kanji: 彼は彼女に好意をもっています。
sentence.romaji: kare ha kanojo ni koui wo mote imasu
sentence.english: He has affections for her.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's doui

sentence.kanji: 彼の意見には同意できません。
sentence.romaji: kare no iken ni ha doui dekimasen
sentence.english: I can't agree with his opinion.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ninka

sentence.kanji: この薬はまだ認可されていません。
sentence.romaji: kono kusuri ha mada ninka sarete imasen
sentence.english: This drug has yet to be approved.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mitomeru

sentence.kanji: 父が彼女との結婚を認めてくれました。
sentence.romaji: chichi ga kanojo to no kekon wo mitomete kuremashita
sentence.english: My father gave me permission to marry her.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ishiki

sentence.kanji: 彼は意識を失いました。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ishiki wo ushinaimashita
sentence.english: He lost consciousness.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kokuren

sentence.kanji: 国連の本部はニューヨークにあります。
sentence.romaji: kokuren no honbu ha nyu-yo-ku ni arimasu
sentence.english: The headquarters of the United Nations is in New York.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's zenkai

sentence.kanji: 前回の続きから始めます。
sentence.romaji: zenkai no tsuzuki kara hajimemasu
sentence.english: We will start where we left off last time.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's omoikite

sentence.kanji: 思い切って彼に相談します。
sentence.romaji: omoikite kare ni soudan shimasu
sentence.english: I'll take the plunge and ask him for advice.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kioku

sentence.kanji: 当時のことはしっかり記憶しているよ。
sentence.romaji: touji no koto ha shikari kioku shite iru yo
sentence.english: I clearly remember what happened at that time.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koka

sentence.kanji: 首相は国家のリーダーだ。
sentence.romaji: shushou ha koka no ri-da- da
sentence.english: The Prime Minister is the leader of the nation.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kokudou

sentence.kanji: この道をまっすぐ進むと国道に出ます。
sentence.romaji: kono michi wo masugu susumu to kokudou ni demasu
sentence.english: If you carry straight on this road you will come out at the national highway.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kuniguni

sentence.kanji: そのマラソン大会にはたくさんの国々から選手が集まったよ。
sentence.romaji: sono marason taikai ni ha takusan no kuniguni kara senshu ga atsumata yo
sentence.english: A lot of athletes from many countries gathered for the marathon.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ninshiki

sentence.kanji: その件は終わったと認識しています。
sentence.romaji: sono ken ha owata to ninshiki shite imasu
sentence.english: My understanding is that the matter is over.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanji

sentence.kanji: あの子は感じの良い子です。
sentence.romaji: ano ko ha kanji no ii ko desu
sentence.english: That child is very likable.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shisou

sentence.kanji: 人には思想の自由がある。
sentence.romaji: hito ni ha shisou no jiyuu ga aru
sentence.english: People have freedom of thought.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kansou

sentence.kanji: ご感想をお聞かせ下さい。
sentence.romaji: gokansou wo okikase kudasai
sentence.english: Please tell me your ideas.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's risou

sentence.kanji: 彼は高い理想を持っているの。
sentence.romaji: kare ha takai risou wo mote iru no
sentence.english: He has high ideals.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kokugai

sentence.kanji: 犯人は国外に逃げたようです。
sentence.romaji: hannin ha kokugai ni nigeta you desu
sentence.english: The criminal seems to have escaped abroad.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kankaku

sentence.kanji: 冷えて指の感覚がない。
sentence.romaji: hiete yubi no kankaku ga nai
sentence.english: I am so cold I can't feel my fingers.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shako

sentence.kanji: 車を車庫に入れておきました。
sentence.romaji: kuruma wo shako ni irete okimashita
sentence.english: I put the car in the garage.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kokyou

sentence.kanji: あの山のすぐ近くが国境です。
sentence.romaji: ano yama no sugu chikaku ga kokyou desu
sentence.english: The border is right near those mountains.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's tekiou

sentence.kanji: 彼はどんな環境にも適応できます。
sentence.romaji: kare ha donna kankyou ni mo tekiou dekimasu
sentence.english: He can adjust to any environment.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kinko

sentence.kanji: ホテルの金庫に貴重品を入れたよ。
sentence.romaji: hoteru no kinko ni kichouhin wo ireta yo
sentence.english: I put my valuables in the hotel safe.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's koukishin

sentence.kanji: 子供は好奇心でいっぱいだね。
sentence.romaji: kodomo ha koukishin de ipai da ne
sentence.english: Children are full of curiosity.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's mawari

sentence.kanji: 先生の周りに集まってください。
sentence.romaji: sensei no mawari ni atsumate kudasai 。
sentence.english: Gather around me now.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's goui

sentence.kanji: 両社が合併に合意しました。
sentence.romaji: ryousha ga gapei ni goui shimashita
sentence.english: The two companies agreed to the amalgamation.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's sou

sentence.kanji: あなたの期待に添えなくてすみません。
sentence.romaji: anata no kitai ni soenakute sumimasen
sentence.english: I'm sorry I couldn't fulfill your expectation.

cards.english: be caused by, be due to
cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's yoru

sentence.kanji: 彼の病気は過労に因るものです。
sentence.romaji: kare no byouki ha karou ni yoru mono desu
sentence.english: His sickness is caused by overwork.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's oujiru

sentence.kanji: 私は彼の要望に応じました。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha kare no youbou ni oujimashita
sentence.english: I responded to his demand.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's ishi

sentence.kanji: 彼は意志の強い人です。
sentence.romaji: kare ha ishi no tsuyoi hito desu
sentence.english: He is a strong-willed man.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kokorozasu

sentence.kanji: 私は医者を志しています。
sentence.romaji: watashi ha isha wo kokorozashite imasu
sentence.english: I am determined to become a doctor.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's igai

sentence.kanji: 意外にも彼は独身です。
sentence.romaji: igai ni mo kare ha dokushin desu
sentence.english: Surprisingly, he is single.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kanarazushimo

sentence.kanji: 親切は必ずしも喜ばれるわけではない。
sentence.romaji: shinsetsu ha kanarazushimo yorokobareru wake de ha nai
sentence.english: Kindness does not please people all the time.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's soeru

sentence.kanji: 贈り物に手書きのカードを添えました。
sentence.romaji: okurimono ni tegaki no ka-do wo soemashita
sentence.english: I attached a hand-written card to the gift.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kokoro

sentence.kanji: 彼は素直な心を持っている。
sentence.romaji: kare ha sunao na kokoro wo mote iru
sentence.english: He has a good heart.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's iki

sentence.kanji: 大きく息を吸ってください。
sentence.romaji: ookiku iki wo sute kudasai
sentence.english: Please take a deep breath.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kushin

sentence.kanji: 苦心して絵を描き上げました。
sentence.romaji: kushin shite e wo kakiagemashita
sentence.english: I took pains over finishing the picture.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's fusawashii

sentence.kanji: その場に相応しい服装で来てください。
sentence.romaji: sono ba ni fusawashii fukusou de kite kudasai
sentence.english: Please come in suitable clothes for the occasion.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's kokuritsu

sentence.kanji: 新しい国立劇場が完成しました。
sentence.romaji: atarashii kokuritsu gekijou ga kansei shimashita
sentence.english: The new National Theater was completed.

cards.rhyme: Remember this word you see, it's shuudan

sentence.kanji: テロ集団が警察に捕まりました。
sentence.romaji: tero shuudan ga keisatsu ni tsukamarimashita
sentence.english: The terrorist group was caught by the police.
